item.title: How to set sensible defaults for github
item.description: I finally got around to setting some sensible defaults to personalize GitHub. The following script works well to set what makes sense for me.

item.title: How to use graphite to manage stacks of PRs better
item.description: Graphite is a tool to help manage stacked PRs. It promotes the creation of small, review-able PRs. It also promotes a specific style of git commands which can be useful.
